privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Rémi Guillette Group ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting the privacy and personal information of our clients and users of our website. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information in accordance with Canada's Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA).

dataCollection.title: What data do we collect?
dataCollection.description: We collect the following personal information when you use our services:

personalInfo.title: Personal information provided directly
items: Information about your business or organization
Messages and communications you send to us

purpose.title: Why are we collecting this information?
purpose.description: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
reasons: Communicate with you about our services
Process your requests and respond to your inquiries
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
Maintain the security of our systems

consent.title: How do we obtain consent?
consent.description: We obtain your consent in several ways:
methods: Implied consent when using our services
Consent through acceptance of terms of use
Consent for cookies via our cookie banner

sharing.title: Who do we share this information with?
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it with:
parties: Third-party service providers who help us operate our website (Replit)
Legal or accounting professionals as needed
Government authorities when required by law
Business partners with your explicit consent

internationalTransfers.title: International transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Our website is hosted by Replit, a U.S. company. Your data may be transferred to and stored in the United States.
internationalTransfers.replitInfo: Replit implements appropriate security measures to protect your data in accordance with international data protection standards.

cookies.title: Cookies and similar technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. These cookies may include session cookies, persistent cookies, and analytics cookies.
cookies.replitCookies: Replit also uses cookies for platform functionality. Please refer to Replit's privacy policy for more information about their cookie usage.

contact.title: Who should I contact if I have questions?
contact.description: For any questions about this privacy policy or your personal information, contact us:

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time.
changes.notification: We will notify you of significant changes through a notice on our website or by email if you have provided your email address.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.description: Under PIPEDA, you have the right to:
userRights: Withdraw your consent (subject to legal restrictions)
File a complaint with the Privacy Commissioner of Canada
